title: cars93
description:
Description
A data frame with 54 rows and 6 columns. This data is a subset of the
Cars93 dataset from the MASS package.
reference:
These cars represent a random sample for 1993 models that were in both
Consumer Reports and PACE Buying Guide. Only vehicles of type
small, midsize, and large were include.

parameters.mpg_city: Vehicle mileage in city (miles per gallon).
parameters.type:
The vehicle type with levels large, midsize,
and small.
parameters.drive_train:
Vehicle drive train with levels 4WD, front,
and rear.

format: A data frame with 54 observations on the following 6 variables.
